verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: referenced] [ARG1: Hillary Clinton] [ARGM-TMP: four times] [ARGM-TMP: this morning] , [ARGM-TMP: during a fairly brief Q&A with reporters] . The election was 577 days ago .
